name: ZomB (itch)
description: ZomB wants to know why everybody wants to pick on the Zombies. Not this time,ZomB is on a mission to save his Zombie Girlfriend,ZomG because a scary pumpkinhead came and swept her away and ZomB must get her back within an amount of time because of a transformation spot they have found. This spot only appears once every 50 years and ZomB knows this world only gets more dangerous and ZomG and B do not want to be brain eating zombies, they want to be real....
